text:
WBOE—
-k-
*#•&*•«•*■**■&■**
lo It might be advisable to consider the possibility of having the workshop start
one week earlier than it did at this session* This might enable some members
to attend who otherwise could not because of school opening dates, I believe
the organization of this workshop was excellent and I have no comments for im¬
provement*,
2« I expected to increase my knowledge of TV station operation, equipment end
test instrumentation* I also hoped to meet other engineers in the educational
TV field and gain a knowledge of their problems and the solutions to them.
Those things would all be valuable to me when we order, install, and operate
our new TV studio.
The workshop provided me with the opportunity to complete these objectives and
in no respect did it fall short of my expectations*
3° I believe it is impractical to attempt arty type of workshop for 20 or more engi¬
neers where actual equipment operation could be conducted. The problems of
such a workshop would be too extensive for value received.,
k° a* I think the suggestion of having a tape copy of Ed Stasheff!s speech avail¬
able to NAEB members should be followed up and notices sent to workshop engi¬
neers when they may obtain same .,
bo If at all possible it might be helpful to make copies of TV log and main¬
tenance report forms available to NAEB members
c. Also if feasible, I think it would be desirable to publish a list of salary
ranges paid to TV technicians* I would be glad to assist in such a study ,
d* It would be interesting to have a list of NAEB engineers and technicians
who are "hams" and their call letters*
These comments are included with item No* U*
Wc B, Louis
■ft***-*#-**#*-
State University of Iowa—
1* I have no suggestions for changes in the workshop set-up or organization*
Some of us during discussions thought it would be a good idea if we would have
a sort of regional conference just after the workshop report is issued so that
more people in our area could benefit by our attendance and it would give us
an opportunity to gather more information which could be disseminated through
the Newsletter* We thought perhaps a two day conference including parts or
all of 3 or U states at a central meeting place* Perhaps you could help us
if you think it a good idea*
2, I expected to receive the benefit of the knowledge and experience of others
to help me do a better job for ray Institution- This is exactly what I got
out of the workshop plus a few ideas of ray own that may benefit others if
they work out*
i
